text: William Fergus (born 26 September 1886, date of death unknown) was a British gymnast. He competed in the men's artistic individual all-around event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:Year of death missing Category:British male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Dunfermline
title: William Fergus
